review: Love this product, only really beneficial when purchased with Prime
author: Chris10

review: Fire Stick's performance is far superior to the Chromecast.. straight out of the box
author: Masud Kadri

review: Received it in two days,  plugged it in and it works great.
author: maria felicetta

review: The stick makes a strange humming noise and constantly gets stuck. There are several apps that I have available on my Roku and other Amazon devices that are simply  not available on my Fire Stick. I would purchase the Roku over this device.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Works great with the exception that it makes the wifi in my house not work as well.
author: Sue K-C "S. K-C"

review: I really thought, could a streaming device improve on an early generation Roku?  The Roku was fine, but our second TV was operated thru a mind numbingly slow Blue Ray player so we decided to replace it with this little jewel.  I was so impressed.  Everything is a little faster than the Roku and sooooo much more searchable.  Its awesome.
author: Are You In?

review: Horrible device. I have a 50 meg download Internet connection, with nothing else running on this Internet connection, start a show or movie and the device takes up every bit of my Internet download. So much so, that I can't do anything else on the Internet, not even basic email.Doesn't matter how long and patient I wait on the streaming/buffering, nothing changes on my Internet download, still maxed out and can hardly get a show to play.I am in the IT industry and know advanced troubleshooting and this device has a serious issue.Also got this device in order to sign up for Sling to view on my TV, Sling membership is going to waste.
author: jwhite0071

review: Would be a 5 if it had the voice remote
author: Dawn V.
